Text: ENJOY ENJOY Knights of Pen and Paper Plus 1 Edition New PC Game by FANISO!

Wow, I was doubting if I should bother with this game, but those screenshots changed my mind!
Jokes aside, thanks for uploading, I have the older version on android and it's disappointing aftera  while, if this is any good I might buy it.
they just updated the android version to have the same content as the new released pc version
Possibility of getting Dungeons & Dragons: Chronicles of Mystara?
I don't get this, all the players act on their own. How do I get to control them? All they do is auto-attack shit.
This game makes no sense. All the players are acting automatically. I can't select any skills and they just autoattack.
gets very repetitive after a while
